title: Mage Armour
content:
Mage Armour Level 1 Abjuration Spell Protect a target from attacks: increase its Armour Class to 13 + its Dexterity modifier. Until Long Rest The target can't be wearing any armour. Melee Action Level 1 Spell Slot
